summary: Wield the mighty Club of Grozy the Bandit Giant
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]So you heard the tales, have you? Drunken flights of fancy from crazed adventurers spoken in slurred tones while sitting around the fire at The Bannered Mare?[/size]
[size=4]Tales of whispered fear spoken in hushed tones you overheard while sneaking through Swindler's Den?[/size]
[size=4]Did you believe that a Giant could be a Bandit and live peacefully with anyone other than other Giants? You thought the tales were complete and utter horse manure, didn't you?[/size]

[size=4]You thought the same thing about Dragons too but there you are... the [/size][i]Dragonborn[/i][size=4].[/size]

[size=4]The following video I made showcasing this mod. Remember to like, share and subscribe to My channel guys. [/size]

[color=#0000ff][size=5][i]To Mod Authors:[/i][/size][/color]
[size=4]If you want your mod focused on specifically and it happens to be in My [/size][url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FzOx07brd8mZ4ZapJDE96jFhkNb3xRGnmdIdfHhS_cc/edit?usp=sharing][size=4]Mod List[/size][/url][size=4] currently, just drop Me a comment on any of My videos and we will work it out. If I don't use your mod currently I'll take a look at it and use one of My other characters to showcase it.[/size]

[youtube]bZm1bu16T9I[/youtube][youtube]JrZ79DFlO2Q[/youtube][/b]

[u][color=#0000ff][size=5][i][b]What this mod does:[/b][/i][/size][/color][/u]

[size=4]adds a book to Jorraskvr entitled "Grozy the Giant Bandit" which upon reading the Player learns the location of Grozy's Camp[/size]
[size=4]Adds Grozy's Camp to the Reach[/size]
[size=4]Adds a Playable Giant's Club which is craftable at any forge and can be improved.[/size]

[u][color=#ff0000][size=5][i]What this mod DOES NOT do:[/i][/size][/color][/u]

[size=4]This mod does NOT add any scripts to the game. [/size]
[size=4]This mod does NOT hold your hand and guide you to Grozy's Camp with a Quest Marker. Reading Comprehension is very important.[/size]
[size=4]This mod does not add any meshes or textures to the game other than the Facegen for a single custom NPC who is NOT standalone[/size]
[size=4]This mod does not supply Kleenex because you got the snot kicked out of you by Grozy and his friend.[/size]

[u][i][color=#0000ff][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/i][/u]
[size=4]Use Mod Manager of choice. Use LOOT to sort[/size]

[u][i][color=#ff0000][size=5]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/i][/u]
[size=4]Use Mod Manager to uninstall by turning of Grozy.esp then uninstall mod. Mod has no scripts and will not bloat your save.[/size]

[size=5][u][i][color=#0000ff]Requirements:[/color][/i][/u]
[/size][size=4]Only Skyrim.esm is required.[/size]

[u][i][color=#ff0000][size=5]Incompatibility:[/size][/color][/i][/u][size=4][color=#ff0000]
[/color]None known unless a mod changes Wilderness -20 -5 in Tamriel.

Mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit

[/size]___________________________
author: The Mighty NINE
